body:
Hello!
So, as Christmas is coming up, I've planned to build a gaming PC. However, I'm unsure of which parts to pick and how to properly assemble them. Moreover, I desire one that has better performance than this (Specs: AMD FX-Series FX-6100 (3.3 GHz),16 GB DDR3 1 TB HDD, Windows 8.1 64-Bit, NVIDIA GeForce GT 640 2GB), especially regarding its graphics card and stability. I apologize for burdening the forums with one of these, but looking off of one of the other threads didn't satisfy my requests. The price range is $600-$650; I would highly appreciate some help. <3

title: PC components assistance :o

replies.body: You can buy used parts from eBay, except for the power supply.
replies.body_tagged: You can buy used parts from eBay, except for the power supply.

replies.body: Me and Loo have a skype group to help out people with PC parts, so add me (itzdonaldtrump) on skype or Loo.
replies.body_tagged: Me and Loo have a skype group to help out people with PC parts, so add me (itzdonaldtrump) on skype or Loo.
